title: Perfect competition in the short run

content.question: In the short run, a firm in a perfectly competitive industry will definitely

choices.label: shut down if total revenue is less than total variable cost
produce the market equilibrium output to maximize profit
cover all of its fixed costs
charge a price lower than its competitors to increase its sales

content.answer: shut down if total revenue is less than total variable cost

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

topic.text: 3.6: Firms' Short-Run Decisions to Produce and Long-Run Decisions to Enter or Exit a Market
